title: [K-12] Application of Hindu Traditional Philosophy for Organizational Learning: Short-Intensive Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of organizational learning and basic mathematical concepts
context.additional_context: Learners access 10-minute modules via smartphones and receive real-time feedback through formative assessments.

learning_goals: They can explain core Hindu traditions (e.g., karma, dharma) within organizational learning contexts.
They can design Hindu philosophy-based organizational learning systems using mathematical modeling.
They can propose three or more team collaboration strategies applying the concept of Yajna (ritual sacrifice).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
